title: A Black Fashion Expert's Take on the 2025 Met Gala: It Could Have Been Better
description: If Pratt Institute fashion professor Adrienne Jones had to rate the 2025 Met Gala red carpet, she'd give it a solid seven out of 10. "After watching, it was kind of where I expected it to be," she told Fashionista the morning after fashion's biggest night. Why didn't she give it a higher score? The ...Continue reading
author: Janelle Sessoms
